currency

Class Currency<CurrencyType extends CurrencyHelper<Type>,Type extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<Type>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • currency.CurrencyHelper<Type>
      • currency.Currency<CurrencyType,Type>
  • Type Parameters:
    Type - they type of number that is used to store the currency value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CurrencyHelper<Type>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dollar

    public abstract class Currency<CurrencyType extends CurrencyHelper<Type>,Type extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<Type>>
extends CurrencyHelper<Type>
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CurrencyHelper<Type>>
    An abstract class that is used when creating other types of currency.
    Author:
    Joshua Zierman [py1422xs@metrostate.edu]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addTogether

        public abstract CurrencyType addTogether(CurrencyType currency)
        Adds the two currencies together
        Parameters:
        currency - the currency to add
        Returns:
        a new Currency object that holds the sum of the two that where added

      • half

        public abstract CurrencyType half()
        halves this currency
        Returns:
        a new currency object that has a value half the operand

      • multiplyBy

        public abstract CurrencyType multiplyBy(double d)
        Multiplies this currency by a double
        Parameters:
        d - the double that this currency is multiplied by
        Returns:
        a new currency object that has an amount equal to this' amount multiplied by d.

      • subtract

        public abstract CurrencyType subtract(CurrencyType currency)
        Subtracts a currency from this
        Parameters:
        currency - the currency to subtract from this
        Returns:
        the new currency object that has an amount equal to this' amount minus the amount of the parameter currency
